mapper.select: SELECT flow.F_ID, flow.F_DATE,flow.F_USERID,dct1.F_CAPTION F_DIRECTION_TYPE, flow.F_NOTE, flow.F_MONEY, flow.F_CAPTION,flow.F_IMGURL, dct2.F_CAPTION F_ACCOUNT_TYPE, dct3.F_CAPTION F_CONSUME_TYPE FROM bs_bookflow flow left join ba_businessdct dct1 on (flow.F_DIRECTION_TYPE = dct1.F_NUMBER and dct1.F_PARENT = '3') left join ba_businessdct dct2 on (flow.F_ACCOUNT_TYPE = dct2.F_NUMBER and dct2.F_PARENT = '2') left join ba_businessdct dct3 on (flow.F_CONSUME_TYPE = dct3.F_NUMBER and dct3.F_PARENT = '1') order by F_DATE DESC
